bike.description: Specialized FSR technology, A1 TransForm Monocoque frame w/ M5-XX ORE technology down tube, butted rear triangle, full sealed cartridge bearing pivots, ITch Switch 100/130mm on the fly adjustable travel, replaceable derailleur hanger
